title: How does the business work?
b

Where does the money come from? Where does the money go? How much money do you have in the bank? What needs to be true in the next year for the business to make a step function increase in value? What are the knowledge gaps between folks in engineering and folks operating the business? In some cases you‚Äôve never operated in the business‚Äô domain before, e.g. having to learn how banking or real estate works, and in those cases it‚Äôs important to dig in there as well.
Share what you‚Äôre observing.
b

Part of earning trust in your new organization is to simultaneously show that you‚Äôre listening and that you‚Äôre not jumping to judgement. I‚Äôve found weekly emails to be an effective format for this, but you could also use a monthly ‚Äúall hands‚Äù meeting or other venue.
Implement at most one or two changes.
b

As you understand the organization, you‚Äôll identify a long list of changes you think might help. Winnow that list down to one or two, work with the existing team to align it to their challenges, and then continue to evolve that process until it works.
